title: the unseen ban is the deadliest
body: just had a bard game(ranked) about 5 mins ago. I HARD-CARRIED the early game (8 asists when my team only had 10 kills), but my internet craped after that to the point when i had more than 1150. so there was no one i could've kept playing thus i tried to dc and then reconnect in hoping that the ping would go down. i reconnected after we had won the game. but i was somehow banned. what is this riot? it just doesn't seem fair to me as i wasn't leaving the game intentionally or throwing, in fact i did the exact opposite by carrying my team's heavy ass. so pls unban me for pity's sake.

replies.body:
Your disconnection probably caused the _automated_ leaver buster system to trigger. 
Unfortunately, this happens sometimes. The placement in LPQ indicates that you probably have left a couple of games before this, or because this was a ranked game & they are treated more harsh than norms/bot games. 

Sending a ticket to support in this case will not do anything for you as they do not remove players from LPQ under **any** circumstances.

> CAN YOU TAKE ME OUT OF LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?
No. We will not take your account out of low priority queue under any circumstances.


If you have any more questions, [check out the leaver buster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Note: Im assuming you were placed in the low priority queue and not banned, if you were banned, you will have received an email outlining why you have been punished.
